name: Pain Relief
description: Discover evidence-based acupuncture and Traditional Chinese Medicine approaches for managing chronic and acute pain. Learn about treatment options for back pain, neck pain, headaches, arthritis, and more.
metaDescription: Evidence-based acupuncture treatments for chronic pain relief. Expert guidance on managing back pain, migraines, arthritis, and more through Traditional Chinese Medicine.

name: Mental Health
description: Explore how acupuncture and holistic wellness practices support mental health. Research-backed information on managing anxiety, depression, stress, and sleep disorders through Traditional Chinese Medicine.
metaDescription: Evidence-based acupuncture for mental health. Learn how TCM supports anxiety relief, depression management, stress reduction, and better sleep quality.

name: Acupressure
description: Master self-care acupressure techniques you can practice at home. Step-by-step guides for pressure point therapy to relieve headaches, nausea, tension, and more without needles.
metaDescription: Learn acupressure techniques for self-care. Step-by-step pressure point guides for headache relief, nausea, stress, and natural healing at home.

name: Traditional Chinese Medicine
description: Understand the foundational principles of Traditional Chinese Medicine. Learn about meridian systems, qi energy, yin-yang balance, and the philosophy behind acupuncture and holistic healing.
metaDescription: Explore Traditional Chinese Medicine principles, meridian systems, qi energy, and the ancient wisdom behind acupuncture and holistic healing practices.

name: Wellness & Prevention
description: Preventative wellness strategies and holistic health practices. Discover how acupuncture and natural medicine support immune health, digestion, hormonal balance, and overall vitality.
metaDescription: Holistic wellness and preventative health through acupuncture. Learn natural approaches to immune support, digestion, hormonal balance, and vitality.
